title: The Great Dictator
actors: Charlie Chaplin, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner, Henry Daniell, Billy Gilbert
story_line: A Jewish Barber is mistaken for the dictator that has been terrorizing the world.

title: Toy Story
actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney, Wallace Shawn, Laurie Metcalf, Annie Potts, John Ratzenberger
story_line: A story of a boy and his toys that come to life

title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
story_line: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

title: Gigli
actors: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, Justin Bartha
story_line: The violent story about how a criminal lesbian, a tough-guy hit-man with a heart of gold, and a mentally challenged man came to be best friends through a hostage.

title: The Danish Poet
story_line: A woman ponders over the strange coincidences that made her forefathers and -mothers meet and create the premises for her becoming the person that she is.

additional.story_line: A line and a Turtle set off on a whirlwind event across Europe, which looks surprisingly like a blank canvas. On this journey, they not only find themselves, but they find love in each others' strength and determination. This love will push them to their limits as they explore the breadth of their capabilities... Derp!
